title: Is there anyone who cloud install Ruby 2.x with rbenv?
body: Is there anyone who cloud install Ruby 2.x with rbenv?

comments.body: I installed 2.3.1 and I think 2.2.2 using rbenv. It can be done!
I tried install rbenv using the GoRails guide, but got a memory overflow error, for some reason that i dont know, bash on windows uses only 1gb of ram.
